text: Hi everyone. I have a question on how to edit specific level of the menu. For example, let say I want only the 1st row to be bold while the rest of the level is normal. Is there a way to do this?

That requires CSS. The default menu code generated by HubSpot has a depth class you can use to target links based on depth.
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/cos/HubSpot-menu-markup>

If you are using the HubL `menu()` function you will need to control that yourself as that HTML is completely written by you
